extension.summary: Fetches favorite games from Batocera and RetroPie and displays them in a Kodi widget
extension.description: Searches through gamelist.xml files in the roms directory for emulationStation-based systems like Batocera and RetroPie and displays favorite games with their thumbnails and metadata as a selectable video widget.

extension.news: v0.1.1 (2024-10-27) - Mostly works. Added support for RetroPie as well as Batocera. May work for other EmulationStation-based systems.
